title: bugslap
body: every time my game starts the screen get black then bugslap

replies.body: If you're getting a bugsplat, then a driver or game file corruption could be failing to render your game.  I recommend using our [game crash](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes+) guide to get this fixed up!  Let me know if you have any questions.
